show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

title: Defense Budget
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Jack Rasmus will welcome two guests to discuss the defense budget and the likelihood (or unliklihood) it will be part of the massive multi-trillion dollar spending cuts that are coming immediately after the November 6 election regardless who wins.
  How big is the defense  budget really?
What is it costing us?
  Can defense be provided with much less spending?
Jack will welcome Michael Eisenscher, Co-Coordinator of US Labor Against the War, and Mike Prokasch of the ‘New Priorities Network’, both of whom have some ideas worth hearing.
